name: Qwilfish
flavorText:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

pokemon.name: Qwilfish
pokemon.flavorText:

spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

pokemon.name: Overqwil
pokemon.flavorText:
Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the
nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
